form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: The N-648 Request for Medical Exception was not accepted due to the following reason. Form Number: 2, The N-648 Request for Medical Exception was not accepted due to the following reason.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/17/2023 ATTACHMENT: 2 090413717 A: Ref N-648 Dated: 10-19-99 The N-648 Request for Medical Exception was not accepted due to the following reason. Physical And Mental Health Information: A full and complete medical diagnosis of the applicant's disability or impairment. including. if applicable, the most recent DSM Code Explanation of how the disability or impairment prevents the applicant from learning or demonstrating knowledge of English and/or U.S. history and government (Question #3 of the Form N-648). A conclusion about whether the applicant is able to learn or demonstrate knowledge of English and/or U.S. history and government because of his or her condition (Question #3 on the Form N-648). A statement of whether or not the applicant's condition resulted from the illegal use of drugs (Question #4 on the Form N-648). A statement of whether or not the applicant's developmental disability first manifested itself before age (Question #4 on the Form N-648). A statement of whether the applicant's condition is temporary (less than 12 months) or permanent (Question #5 on the Form N-648). Background Information: The date of your last examination of the applicant (Question #1 on the Form N-648). Identification if this was your first examination of the applicant and, if it was, the name of the regular attending doctor (Question #2 on the Form N-648). Your medical specialty or the qualifications and experience that permit you to make the assessment on the Form N-648 (Question #6 on the Form N-648). Did not sign under penalty of perjury the Form N-648, and identify the date of signing. Note: You may not use a stamp in place of your original signature. Did not type or print your last name, first name, and middle name on the bottom of page 2 of the Form N-648. Did not type or print your business address and telephone number on the bottom of page 2 of the Form N-648. Did not type or print your license number and licensing state on the bottom of page 2 of the Form N-648. Other
